unnormalised: India's cricket calendar is jam-packed, isn't it? From IPL to World Cups, it's a non-stop rollercoaster. And honestly, keeping track of it all can be a bit of a challenge. Last year, the Asia Cup finals were on 28/08/2023 and everyone was glued to their screens!
normalised: India's cricket calendar is jam-packed, isn't it? From I-P-L to World Cups, it's a non-stop rollercoaster. And honestly, keeping track of it all can be a bit of a challenge. Last year, the Asia Cup finals were on twenty eighth august two thousand and twenty three and everyone was glued to their screens!

unnormalised: This year's looking pretty intense too. The T20 World Cup is scheduled to kick off on 01/06/2024 in the West Indies and USA, which is like, the middle of the night for us here in India. Imagine the late-night chai sessions! I've already started prepping my sleep schedule (or lack thereof).
normalised: This year's looking pretty intense too. The T-twenty World Cup is scheduled to kick off on first june two thousand and twenty four in the West Indies and U-S-A, which is like, the middle of the night for us here in India. Imagine the late-night chai sessions! I've already started prepping my sleep schedule (or lack thereof).

unnormalised: Then there's the domestic scene. The Ranji Trophy final was a nail-biter, concluding on 14/03/2024. Karnataka beat Saurashtra by a narrow margin. Truly, edge-of-the-seat stuff. I remember watching the highlights the next day; what a game!
normalised: Then there's the domestic scene. The Ranji Trophy final was a nail-biter, concluding on fourteenth march two thousand and twenty four. Karnataka beat Saurashtra by a narrow margin. Truly, edge-of-the-seat stuff. I remember watching the highlights the next day; what a game!

unnormalised: Speaking of the IPL, the buzz is already building up. This year’s opening match happened on 22/03/2024 at 7:30 PM. As usual, we can expect some thrilling matches, unexpected upsets, and of course, the iconic sixes that land in the stands. Let's see if CSK can defend their title.
normalised: Speaking of the I-P-L, the buzz is already building up. This year’s opening match happened on twenty second march two thousand and twenty four at seven thirty P-M. As usual, we can expect some thrilling matches, unexpected upsets, and of course, the iconic sixes that land in the stands. Let's see if C-S-K can defend their title.

unnormalised: But it's not just cricket, you know. The Indian Super League (ISL) final played on 04/05/2024. These matches are usually held around 7 PM. There’s also the Pro Kabaddi League, with matches nearly every day from 8:00 PM onwards. So many options!
normalised: But it's not just cricket, you know. The Indian Super League (I-S-L) final played on fourth may two thousand and twenty four. These matches are usually held around seven P-M. There’s also the Pro Kabaddi League, with matches nearly every day from eight zero zero P-M onwards. So many options!

unnormalised: So, mark your calendars folks! Get ready for a year filled with sporting action. From international tournaments to local leagues, there's something for everyone. And don't forget to set those alarms, because some of these games happen at the craziest hours! The sports season is always in full swing!
